attributes.action: Confirm that you recognise yourselves as the servants of the British people.
attributes.additional_details: Ab actu ad posse valet illatio
attributes.background: It seems that subsequent Governments refuse to carry out the wishes of the voters who elected them. We need to know that you are there to support the British people. If you are not, then really, there is no point in the British people voting.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
